text: A Strange Kind of Colonel (French:Un drôle de colonel) is a 1968 French comedy film directed by Jean Girault and starring Jean Lefebvre, Jean Yanne and Pascale Roberts.Rège p.444 ==Cast== * Jean Lefebvre as Cutterfeet * Jean Yanne as Barton * Pascale Roberts as Marina * Jean Le Poulain as Le pasteur * Jacques Dynam as Le policeman / Policeman * Henri Virlojeux as Le savant / Trilby Beach * Pierre Tornade as Un inspecteur * Florence Blot as Hortense Tito * Françoise Girault as Terry * Jean Valmont as Smith * Michel Galabru as Le colonel * Maria Pacôme as Aurélia * Michel Ardan as Le journaliste * Yves Barsacq as Le patron du pub * Robert Rollis as Le cireur == References == == Bibliography == * Philippe Rège. Encyclopedia of French Film Directors, Volume 1. Scarecrow Press, 2009. == External links == * Category:1968 films Category:French films Category:French comedy films Category:1968 comedy films Category:French-language films Category:Films directed by Jean Girault Category:Films set in London
title: A Strange Kind of Colonel
